TopicTitle: CurseForge needs to support 0.90 for mods

Articles.Content:
It is not currently possible to select 0.90 as the KSP version a mod is compatible with. Can this be added please?

Also, a minor thing, the checkboxes on the "all files" pages of mods are rendered very small in IE11.

It is not currently possible to select 0.90 as the KSP version a mod is compatible with. Can this be added please?

Also, a minor thing, the checkboxes on the "all files" pages of mods are rendered very small in IE11.

0.90 was added yesterday, and has been being used as a selectable version. Is it still not showing up for you?

Well, it definitely wasn't showing when I uploaded my new version 17 hours ago, wasn't showing when I posted that message 12 hours ago and still wasn't showing about 8 or 9 hours ago. If it was updated before this then could it have been because I didn't log out and back in?

It is showing now and it appears that someone has helpfully updated my latest upload, so thanks to who ever that was...
